snippet.title: Lone Echo - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
"Lone Echo" is an exclusive Oculus Rift and Touch experience brought to you by Ready At Dawn.
http://www.LoneEcho.com/

This is our updated announcement trailer in 1080p and 60FPS. Enjoy!

Like Us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/LoneEchoGame
Follow Us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/LoneEchoGame
Follow Us on Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/LoneEchoGame
